Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Service interface for managing users.

Defines methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting users, as well as assigning, completing, and unassigning tasks for users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    reactor.core.publisher.Mono<List<IdResponseDto>>
    addTasks(String userId, AddTaskDto addTaskDto)
    Assigns tasks to a user.

    completeTask(String userId, String taskId)
    Marks a task as completed for a specific user.

    createUser(CreateUserDto user)
    Creates a new user.
    reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UpdateResponseDto>
    deleteAssignedTask(String userId, String taskId)
    Unassigns a specific task from a user.

    deleteUser(String id)
    Deletes a task by its ID.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<IdResponseDto> createUser(CreateUserDto user)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the CreateUserDto containing user information
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the IdResponseDto of the created user

    • findUserByID

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UserResponseDto> findUserByID(String id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the UserResponseDto if found, or an error if not found

    • findUserByUsername

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UserResponseDto> findUserByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by their username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the user
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the UserResponseDto if found, or an error if not found

    • findAllUsers

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<PageResponseDto<UserResponseDto>> findAllUsers(int page, int size, FilterDto filter)
      Retrieves all users with pagination and optional filtering.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number (zero-based)
      size - the number of users per page
      filter - the FilterDto containing filtering criteria
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting a PageResponseDto containing a list of UserResponseDto, total number of users, and pagination details

    • addTasks

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<List<IdResponseDto>> addTasks(String userId, AddTaskDto addTaskDto)
      Assigns tasks to a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      addTaskDto - the AddTaskDto containing task IDs to assign
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting a list of IdResponseDto for assigned tasks

    • completeTask

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<IdResponseDto> completeTask(String userId, String taskId)
      Marks a task as completed for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      taskId - the ID of the task
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the IdResponseDto of the completed task

    • deleteAssignedTask

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<UpdateResponseDto> deleteAssignedTask(String userId, String taskId)
      Unassigns a specific task from a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user
      taskId - the ID of the task
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting an UpdateResponseDto with matched and modified counts

    • deleteUser

      reactor.core.publisher.Mono<IdResponseDto> deleteUser(String id)
      Deletes a task by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the task to delete
      Returns:
      a Mono emitting the IdResponseDto of the deleted user, or an error if the user does not exist
